title: Removing a working set immediately causes changes to occur
description: When removing a working set in the application, changes are immediately applied to the view.
OB: Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered accordingly.
EB: After removing the working set, the changes should be reflected in the view, and the package filtering should be removed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. Verify that the package view is filtered accordingly.
2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set.
3. Delete the first working set and observe the changes in the package view.
